#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#include<cstdio>
#define scan(a) scanf("%d",&a)
#define print(a) printf("%d\n",a)
#define FOR(i,a,b) for(i=a;i<b;i++)
int main(){
	int test,n,i;
	scan(test);
	while(test--){
		scan(n);
		int num=0;
		for(i=n;i>0;i--){
			int x=i,flag;
		while(x>0){
			flag=0;
			num=x%10;
			if(num==1||num==3)
			x=x/10;
			else{
			flag=1;
			break;}
		}
		if(flag!=1){
			print(i);
			break;
		}
	}
	}
	return 0;
}
